Welcome to Silas Cove


Beachside dining in beautiful Oceanscape, Cornwall.


Explore Our Menu

Relax. Sip. Savour.

Nestled in the heart of Oceanscape, Silas Cove is your go to beach bar for breathtaking views, fresh local seafood, and a warm Cornish welcome.

Just a few steps from the shoreline, our relaxed yet stylish setting offers sweeping vistas of Cornwall's dramatic coastline, where golden sands meet the ever-changing Atlantic, a view that never fails to impress (even if the British weather tries its best).Whether you're joining us for a leisurely lunch, evening drinks as the sun sets, or a romantic dinner overlooking the waves, Silas Cove promises a truly memorable seaside experience.

Our menu is a tribute to Cornwall's rich coastal larder, featuring sustainably sourced seafood, locally grown produce, and a few seasonal surprises that keep things interesting and delicious.

With friendly, down-to-earth service, a relaxed atmosphere, and the soothing sound of the sea never far away, Silas Cove is the perfect place to unwind, indulge, and enjoy the very best of the Cornish coast.
